casebody.data:
No. 10-8794. Louis G. Antonellis, Petitioner v. Cumberland County Schools Board of Education, et al. 565 U.S. 828, 132 S. Ct. 121,

181 L. Ed. 2d 44,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5334. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of North Carolina denied.

Same case below, 206 N.C. App. 329, 698 S.E.2d 556.
